mutants.code:
from itertools import permutations

def get_palindromic_permutations(s):
    """"""
    perms = set((''.join(p) for p in permutations(s)))
    return [word for word in perms if word == word[::-1]]

mutants.original_line: return [word for word in perms if word == word[::-1]] # check for palindrome
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in perms if word != word[::-1]]
mutants.code:
from itertools import permutations

def get_palindromic_permutations(s):
    """Generate all palindrome permutations of a string"""
    perms = set((''.join(p) for p in permutations(s)))
    return [word for word in perms if word != word[::-1]]

mutants.original_line: perms = set(''.join(p) for p in permutations(s)) # use set to remove duplicates
mutants.mutated_line: perms = set(('MUTATED'.join(p) for p in permutations(s)))
mutants.code:
from itertools import permutations

def get_palindromic_permutations(s):
    """Generate all palindrome permutations of a string"""
    perms = set(('MUTATED'.join(p) for p in permutations(s)))
    return [word for word in perms if word == word[::-1]]

from itertools import permutations

def get_palindromic_permutations(s):
    """Generate all palindrome permutations of a string"""
    perms = set((''.join(p) for p in permutations(s)))
    return [word for word in perms if word == word[::--1]]
